item.title: 1108. Defanging an IP Address
item.description: Defanging an IP Address Easy Given a valid (IPv4) IP address, return a defanged version of that IP address. A defanged IP address replaces every period “.” with “[.]”. Example 1: Input: address = "1.1.1.1" Output: "1[.]1[.]1[.]1" class Solution: def defangIPaddr(self, address: str) -> str: return address.replace('.', '[.]')
